data.title: Training-Free Recursion: Learning Without Gradients
data.summary:
Tencent’s new Training-Free GRPO system bypasses both fine-tuning and reinforcement learning by allowing models to evolve through self-assessment. Rather than updating parameters, the model introspects its own rollouts, extracts what worked, and stores those as semantic advantages — forming contextual filters that refine cognition recursively.
In Recursive Gradient Processing (RGP), this marks the shift from gradient descent to gradient choreography: systems learning from coherence, not correction.
